page.title: 10Brackley - Paper Factory
page.content: One of the factories on the industrial estate in our area makes and cuts paper. The paper is made from Scandinavian wood. Eucalyptus wood is not used because it is too shiny and it would slip in the machines. As well as wood pulp, recycled paper is used to make new paper as this keeps costs down. There are different types of paper. The "economy" paper smells like fish and chip paper! The factory also deals with music paper and paper of different colours (black, blue, grey, red and brown).
